name: Chicken Fight
description:
~ ~ ~ ~ Welcome To Chicken Fight ~ ~ ~ ~
Chicken Fight is a platformer beat 'em up where you utilize your environment to defeat your enemies who consist of mutant frogs, werewolves, and even other chickens. There is a variety of modes, maps and gamemodes to play for everyone to enjoy.


~ ~ ~ ~ PVP ~ ~ ~ ~
Fight in unique maps and gamemodes, local and online combined.

(Controller required for local multiplayer, only one keyboard input device allowed)

~ ~ ~ ~ Story Mode ~ ~ ~ ~
Explore a series of levels, all very unique from each other and filled with fun platforming and cool secrets.

(Controller required for local multiplayer, only one keyboard input device allowed)

~ ~ ~ ~ Map Editor ~ ~ ~ ~
Think of creative new ways to play the game and create fun levels for people to fight in.
